GK16visa01cu:1: granthārambhe nirvinghena prāripsitaparisamāptikāmo vāṅmayādhikṛtatayā vāgdevatāyāḥ sāṃmukhyamādhatte--
GK16visa01cu:6: dṛṣṭvā bhūritadhvaniprabhṛtikālaṅkāraśāstraṃ muhu- stanmūlañca visṛṣṭamarthamakhilaṃ kāvyaprakāśasya ca /
GK16visa01cu:7: sāhityottaradarpaṇaṃ viśadayannāndayan sajjanān bhaṭṭācāryyamaheśvaro vitanute vijñāpriyāṃ ṭippaṇīm // 2 //
GK16visa01cu:13: ārambhakālasya sthūlatvād yogyatāvaśāt tatpūrvakāle eva sāmmukhyādhānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:14: na ca śloke sāmmukhyādhānabodhakābhāvāt kathamidamābhāṣitamiti vācyam,
GK16visa01cu:15: śaradindvityādi tatsaundaryyakathanarūpastutyā svacetasi tamonāśār'tha prakāśanaprārthanayā ca tallābhāt,
GK16visa01cu:16: stutasyānukūlatvaniyamāt tadānukūlyaṃ pratyevābhīṣṭhaprārthanācca cetasyarthaprakāśe satyapi vighnād granthasya samāptirna bhavatītyate /
GK16visa01cu:18_1: kāmanayāpi vighnābhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇāṃśo viṣayīkriyate ahaṃ sukhī syāmiti kāmanayā sukhaṃśā iva /
GK16visa01cu:19: prāripsitagranthaparisamāptirūpe phale 'nyadevatāpekṣayā tasyāḥ śīghnakāritvapratipādanāya tadviśeṣaṇamāha--vāṅmayeti--svārthe mayaṭ /
GK16visa01cu:22: tathā ca vāgātmakasya granthasya nirvighnaparisamāptirūpaṃ phalaṃ vāgadhikāriṇyā śīghraṃ dātuṃ śakyameveti darśitam /
GK16visa01cu:31: pāraṃ sāhityavidyābdhergantuṃ vāñchanti ye kṣitau kṛtireṣā taristeṣāṃ viśvanāthamahākaveḥ // 5 //
GK16visa01cu:33: yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tat kvacit // 6 //
GK16visa01cu:36_0: iha khalu sūtrāṇāmevārthaṃ vṛttyā viśadīkurvan granthādau vighnavighātāya avigītasadācāraparamparāprāptatayā
GK16visa01cu:41: vāṅmayetyanena svaśāstravidheyavagvaibhavadātṛtayā hmādidevārādhyatvena bhagavatyāḥ prakṛtārthanirvāhakatvaṃ mcitam /
GK16visa01cu:54: atrādye pāde luptopamāmahimnā śaradindorapi sundararucitvaṃ santataṃ tamaḥ padārthāndhakāranāśakatvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādyakhilārthaprakāśakatvaṃ ca siddhyati /
GK16visa01cu:55: tathā ca ebhiḥ sādharmyaiḥ śaradindugīrdevyorupamānopameyabhāva iti bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:61: asya granthasya kāvyāṅgatayā kāvyaphalaireva phalavattvamiti kāvyaphalānyāha--
GK16visa01cu:64: caturvargaphalaprāptihi kovyato “rāmādivatpravatitavyaṃ na rāvaṇādivat” ityādiḥ kṛtyākṛtyapravṛttinivṛttyupadeśadvāreṇa supratītaiva /
GK16visa01cu:76_1: prayojane vatkavye “aṅginaḥ phalenaivāṅgasya phalavattā“iti nyāyāt utkāṃ kāvyaphalapratipādikāṃ
GK16visa01cu:82: nanu kathaṃ kavinoptāditetivṛttānāṃ mālatīmādhavaratnāvalīmṛcchakaṭikādīnāṃ svābhidheyeṣu prāmāṇyam ?
GK16visa01cu:83: nacāpramāṇarūpasya śabdasya śāstratvamiti cedatrāha--- “suvidagdhapramā kāvyaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvabheva naḥ /
GK16visa01cu:86: natu prakārabhedāḥ prahelikā vyahgyārthaviśiṣṭhā nīrasā vākyaviśeṣāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:87: yathā- ke dārapoṣaṇaratāḥ kā śītalāmbuvāhinī gaṅgā /
GK16visa01cu:88: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam “iti /
GK16visa01cu:89: atra hi praśnarūpor'tho vācyaḥ, uttararūpaśca vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:100: na yadevaṃ na tadevaṃ yathā praheliketi /
GK16visa01cu:101: nanu rasarūpapramāṇatvepi prakaraṇādeḥ ratyāsvādānantaramasadbhūtatvenārthānarthopadarśanābhāvāddhitāhitapravṛtt inivṛttikāritvaprayojitaṃ kathaṃ hi śāstratvamiti na vācyam /
GK16visa01cu:118: “ekaḥ śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ samyagjñātaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati” ityādivedavākyebhyaśca suprasiddhaiva /
GK16visa01cu:130: tathā ca samastakāvyaprayojanam--“kāvyaṃ yaśaser'thakṛteṭha iti yat kāvyaprakāśakāreṇoktaṃ tacca “karoti kīrttiṃ prītiṃ ca” ityatraivoktam,
GK16visa01cu:137: caturvargaprāptirhi vedaśāstrebhyo nīrasatayā duḥkhādeva pariṇatabuddhīnāmeva jāyate /
GK16visa01cu:142: nanu caturvargaphalasādhake vedaśāstre sati kimarthaṃ lokaḥ kāvye pravarttatāmityata āha--caturvargaphalaprāptiriti /
GK16visa01cu:149: nanu tahi pariṇatabuddhibhiḥ satsu vedaśāstreṣu kimiti kāvye yatnaḥ karaṇīya ityapi na vaktavyam /
GK16visa01cu:150: kaṭukauṣadhopaśamanīyasya rogasya sitaśarkaropaśamanīyatve kasya vā rogiṇaḥ sitaśarkarāpravṛttiḥ sādhīyasī na syāt ?
GK16visa01cu:160: tena hetunā tasya kāvyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GK16visa01cu:168: śaktiḥ kavitvabījarūpaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ yāṃ vinā kāvyaṃ na prasaret, prasṛtaṃ vā upahasanīyaṃ syāt /
GK16visa01cu:170: kāvyaparīkṣaṇaṃ didarśayiṣuḥ prācīnakāvyalakṣaṇeṣu prameyavirodhaṃ darśayannāha--tat kiṃ svarūpamityāha--“tadadoṣāviti” taditi kāvyam,
GK16visa01cu:185: “nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:186: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ” //
GK16visa01cu:199: śakrasya jetāram arthāt meghanādaṃ mama putraṃ dhik dhik,
GK16visa01cu:200: tathā prabodhitavatā prabodhitaṃ prabodhaḥ tadvatā bhāvaktantatvena prabodhavatā kumbhakarṇena vā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:201: natvatra ktavatuḥ, tasya karmaṇyanabhidhānāt, tathā mama bhujairvāpi kim ?
GK16visa01cu:210: asya śalokasya vidheyāvimarśadoṣaduṣṭatayā kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:215: vidheyāvimarśeti--vidheyasya nyakkārasyoddeśyādarimattvāt pūrvanipātāt “anuvādyamanuktvaina vidheyamudīrayet” iti niyamāt /
GK16visa01cu:221: “idamuttamamatiśayini vyaṅgye vācyād dhvanirbudhaiḥ kathitaḥ” ityanena lakṣaṇena dhvaniyuktatvādasya uttamakāvyatvasvīkārāt,
GK16visa01cu:222: tasmādavyāptidoṣa iti---atra doṣasāmānyābhāvo lakṣaṇaghaṭaka iti tadabhiprāyamunnīya idamuktam,
GK16visa01cu:224: anyathā “tathābhūtāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpasadasi pāñcālatanayām” ityādiślekaḥ kākusahakṛtadhvanyudāharaṇatayoktvā kathaṃ tenaiva nyūnapadatvadoṣe udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:225: kathaṃ vā “kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yairidaṃ gurupātakam” ityādiślekaḥ raudrarasodāharaṇatvenoktvāpi punaruktadoṣatve udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:229_1: vidheyatāṃ netumucitasya tatpuruṣasamāsena kavinā guṇībhāvaṃ nītatayā pūrvasiddhatvāt
GK16visa01cu:244: bhujairiti bahuvacanasya tadvyañjakaviśeṣatvāt asaṃlakṣyakamo dhvaniścātra svāmānanānnirvedākhyaḥsaṃcāribhāvaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:248: nanu kaścidevāṃśo 'tra duṣṭo na punaḥ sarvo 'pīti cet,
GK16visa01cu:250: yatra dhvaniḥ sa uttamakāvyatvaprayojaka ityaṃśābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇamidaṃ kāvyamakāvyaṃ vā kimapi na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:251: na ca kaṃcidevāṃśaṃ kāvyasya dūṣayantaḥ śratiduṣṭādayo doṣāḥ, kiṃ tarhi sarvameva kāvyam /
GK16visa01cu:259: nanvaṃśaviśeṣasthitena doṣeṇa aparāṃśādūṣaṇāttadaṃśe kāvyatvaṃ doṣavadaṃśe cākāvyatvaṃ syādata āha--naceti /
GK16visa01cu:260: kiṃ tarhi samastameveti, samastasyaiva dūṣaṇe yuktimāha--tathā hi--anyatheti /
GK16visa01cu:268: idaṃ padyam, nanu padaikasyaiva viṣayasya viruddhadharmayogaḥ syāt /
GK16visa01cu:269: iha tu doṣasya yadaṅgasya dūṣakatvaṃ tasyākāvyatvam,
GK16visa01cu:270: dhvaneśca yasyotkarṣakatvaṃ tasyottamakāvyatvamiti dvayorna virodhaḥ ityāśaṅkyāha-na ceti /
GK16visa01cu:276: anityadoṣāḥ śrutikaṭuprabhṛtayaḥ tathā hiraudrādirase prarūḍhaśrutikaṭutvasya guṇatvam,
GK16visa01cu:278: arddhepārīndramarddhenaramahaha mahālokamālokya lokāḥ stokāstokāviśeṣāḥ śaraṇamupayayurvāridhiṃ vāridhiṃ vā” //
GK16visa01cu:284: kiñca evaṃ kāvyaṃ praviralaviṣayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vā syāt, sarvathā nirdeṣasyaikāntamasaṃbhavāt /
GK16visa01cu:298: nanvīṣadarthe nañaḥ prayoga iti cettarhi “īṣaddoṣau śabdārthau kāvyam” ityukte nirdeṣayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visa01cu:301: (vi, ṭha) īṣadarthe naña iti---adoṣāviti naña ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:309: nirdeṣayoḥ kvacit kadācit kavinādoṣabhāvena nirmitayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na syāt,
GK16visa01cu:315: nahī kīṭānuvedhādayo ratnasya ratnatvaṃ vyāhantumīśāḥ kintūpādeyatāratamyameva kartum /
GK16visa01cu:323: (vi, ḍa) sati sambhava iti---sphuṭadāṣarahite kadācidīṣaddoṣasya sambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:324: uktañceti---yatra rasādīnāmasaṃlakṣyakramāṇām anugamaḥ sphuṭaḥ tatra duṣṭeṣvapi kīṭānuviddharatnādisādhāraṇyena kāvyatā matā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:330: guṇānāṃ rasaikadharmatvasya “ye rasasyāṅgino dharmāḥ śauryādaya ivātmanaḥ” ityādinā tenaiva pratipāditatvāt /
GK16visa01cu:334: (vi, ḍha) evamadoṣāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa01cu:338: (lo, au) evamadoṣatvasya kāvyalakṣaṇatvaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇatvasyāpi dūṣayati /
GK16visa01cu:343: ayamarthaḥ-śabdārthau khalu prācīnoktarītyā nirbhitau rasābhivyañjakau bhavato 'pyanumatau;
GK16visa01cu:345: yadāha sa eva “guṇavṛttyā punasteṣāṃ sthitiḥ śabdārthayormatā“iti /
GK16visa01cu:347: upacārataḥ saguṇau śabdārthau kāvyamiti yaducyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:350: tayoḥ kāvyasvarūpeṇābhimatayoḥ śabdārthayo raso 'sti, na vā ?
GK16visa01cu:351: nāsti cet, guṇavattvamapi nāsti, guṇānāṃ tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt /
GK16visa01cu:352: asti cet ? kathaṃ noktaṃ rasavantāviti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa01cu:357: saguṇayo raso 'sti naveti, ayamarthaḥ--rasasya sadbhāve eva kāvyatvaṃ tadabhāve veti /
GK16visa01cu:362: yadi guṇābhivyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ satoreva kāvyalakṣaṇatvamābhimataṃ tadā lakṣaṇasya nyūnapadatvam /
GK16visa01cu:364: guṇavattvānyathānupapattyaitallabhyata iti cet ? tarhi sarasāvityeva vaktuṃ yuktam , na saguṇāviti /
GK16visa01cu:370: śauryyadyāśrayaprāṇyāśraye deśe 'nayā śauryyādimanto deśā iti kenāpi nocyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:372: tathā hi paramparāghaṭakya madhyabhūtasambandhino bahirindriyapratyakṣatve satyeva naikamāropaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:373: yatra tu paramparāghaṭakamadhyabhūtasambandhī na bahīrindriyaprataykṣastatratvevamārepo dṛśyata eva /
GK16visa01cu:374: yathā śīto vāyuruṣṇaṃ jalaṃ sugandhirvāyurittra paramparāsambandhaghaṭakānāṃ madhyabhūtajalāgnipuṣpāvayavānāṃ sūkṣyamatvenāpratyakṣatvāt tādṛśa āropaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:375: prakṛte 'pi bahirindriyāprataykṣasya rasādeśca paramparāsambandhaghaṭakatvāt sambhavatyeva guṇavattāropaḥ śabdārthayoriti /
GK16visa01cu:380: yadi ca tādṛśaropo nāsti tadā kāraṇāntarābhāvasyaiva tatra kalpanīyatvāt /
GK16visa01cu:381: ata enodayanācāryyairuktam, “ārope sati nimittānusaraṇaṃ na tu nimittamasti ityāropaḥ” iti /
GK16visa01cu:382: yastu javākusumasya vahirindriyapratyakṣatve 'pi lohitaḥ sphaṭika ityāropaḥ tatra javākusumaṃ nedṛśaparamparāghaṭakaṃ javākusumasya sphaṭikāvṛttitvāt /
GK16visa01cu:383: kintu javākusumasya svacchadravyasānnidhyameva tadrahitaṃ pṛthagevāropanimittamiti sudhībhiravadheyam /
GK16visa01cu:388: tena alaṅkārāḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādivaditi vacanena alaṅkārasyotkarṣamātrādhāyakatvāt lakṣaṇaṃ parāstamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:396: etacca etadgranthakṛtā svakṛtāyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ likhitamapi prācīnagauravaniyantritenātropekṣitam /
GK16visa01cu:397: adoṣatvādīnāṃ tu kāvyalakṣaṇatve prameyārthavirodhaprasaṅga iti tannirākṛtam //
GK16visa01cu:399: nanu “śabdārthau saguṇau” ityanenaguṇābhivyañjakau śabdārthau kāvye prayojyāvityabhiprāya iti cet ?
GK16visa01cu:400: na, guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthavattvasya kāvye utkaṣamātrādhāyakatvam , na tu svarūpādhāyakatvam /
GK16visa01cu:404: idānīṃ saguṇatvaviśeṣaṇasya na lakṣaṇaghaṭakatvaṃ kintu kavyupadeśaparatvamityāśaṅkate,
GK16visa01cu:410: na tu svarūpādhāyakatvāmityasya svarūpe lakṣaṇe na niveśaucityamityeva,
GK16visa01cu:420: etena “analaṅkṛtī punaḥ kvāpi” iti yaduktam, tadapi parāstam /
GK16visa01cu:421: asyārthaḥ- sarvatra sālaṅkārau kvacittvasphuṭālaṅkārāvapi śabdārthau kāvyamiti /
GK16visa01cu:439: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapā- ste conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:440: sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate //
GK16visa01cu:449: revātīre kṛtasaṅketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ svagṛhe iyaṃ bhāvanā /
GK16visa01cu:450: utkaṇṭhākaraṇaṃ mama yadyapi nāsti tathāpi tatra kṛtasaṅkete revārodhasi revātīre vetasīnāmatarutale suratavyāpārarūpalīlāvidhinimittaṃ cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:453: sa eva varaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ, yatheṣṭaratisamartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:454: caitrakṣapā api saṅketasthala ivātrāpyaviśiṣṭā ityāha--“tā eva'; iti /
GK16visa01cu:457: ata eva te prauḍhāḥ api mandatvaparyyavasannāḥ vanānilasya prauḍhatve 'pi mandatvaṃ vahabahirbhāvena /
GK16visa01cu:459: caitre kadambapuṣpasyābhāva eva, kecittu dhūlīkadambapuṣpaparatayā vyācakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:460: tanmate vāyoḥ prauḍhatvaviśeṣaṇānaucityāpatteḥ anye tūnmīlitamālatīnāṃ te ca prauḍhasurabhayo ghrāṇatarpaṇagandhāḥ, iti vāyacakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:462: tadā kadambānilā ityatra te ca ityasyābhāvāt, pratyatrijñānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa01cu:464: sā ceti ahamapi tadavasthaiva, ubhayatra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:468: evaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtaḥ sphuṭālaṅkāravirahodāharaṇe sphuṭālaṅkāraṃ darśayannāha,
GK16visa01cu:471: tadakṛtakapremāsakṛttayā yo 'tivāhitavān sa kaumāraharaḥ varaḥ svayaṃvṛtaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:473: caitro vasanta;, tatra jātikadambābhāvāt, mālatī vāsantikā /
GK16visa01cu:475: saṃpradāyavidastu sa eva vasantaḥ tā eva varṣā iti manmathoddīpakatvāviśeṣād ṛtudvayasyāpi graha iti vyācakṣate /
GK16visa01cu:483: “sati hetau phalābhāve viśeṣoktiḥ” iti ca lakṣaṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt;
GK16visa01cu:488: tathā hi kāraṇābhāve phalāt kāraṇasadbhāve phalābhāvācca vismayasya utthāpitattvāttat sthāyibhāvako 'dbhutarasaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:491: kiṃ vā sa eva rasābhāsādbhutarasasyāṅgamiti prayo 'laṅkāracha,
GK16visa01cu:496: tathā cātra kāraṇabhāvaphalābhāvayorvācakasya naño 'bhāvena tat kalpanāyā vilambenāsphuṭatvāt evaṃ tayorasphuṭatvācca sutarāṃ tanmūladarśitālaṅkārayorasphuṭatvam /
GK16visa01cu:498: (lo, u) atra hīti kāraṇābhāve kāryyotpattirvibhāvanā sā cātrāsphuṭā /
GK16visa01cu:502: yadi khalu priyasaṅgamābhāvādīnāṃ kāraṇānāmasadbhāvamukhena varṇanaṃ tadeva tasyāḥ sphuṭatvam /
GK16visa01cu:506: atra ca teṣu satkhapi dhṛtirnotpannetyutkaṇṭhotpattimukhena varṇitam,
GK16visa01cu:508: tadā kāryyānutpatteḥ sphuṭatayoktatvāt viśeṣoktiḥ sphuṭā syāt /
GK16visa01cu:510: evamatra dvayorvibhāvanāviśeṣoktyorasphuṭārthatvāt sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti kāvyaprakāśakṛto matam /
GK16visa01cu:513: tathāpi tadubhayārabdhasandehe saṅkarālaṅkārasya sphuṭatvāt kathaṃ sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti /
GK16visa01cu:518: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvan kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati” //
GK16visa01cu:526: viśeṣaścātra sarasāviti vacane śrutyarthatvena saguṇāviti vacanaṃ samanantaroktarītyānarthakam /
GK16visa01cu:529: “kāvyasyātmā dhvaniḥ“-- iti tatkiṃ vastvalaṅkārarasādilakṣaṇāstirūpo dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā,
GK16visa01cu:539: na ca tadapi kāvyameveti vācyaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsvādyatvavaśādeva kāvyātmatvakathanāt /
GK16visa01cu:546: ityatra yaḥ pūrṇakalaśo vyaṅgyastasyābodhyatāyāmeva kavestātparyyādatraiva vaicitryeṇa alaṅkāra eva prahelikā /
GK16visa01cu:547: yattu asphuṭākhye guṇībhūte vyaṅgye kṛcchragamyatvaṃ tatra kṛcchragamyatāyāṃ na kavestātparyyamatastasya nātikṛcchragamyatvam,
GK16visa01cu:551: mayāpi “vākyaṃ rasātmakaṃ kāvyam'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:560: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam” //
GK16visa01cu:562: tathā hi--dārāṇāṃ bhāryyāṇāṃ poṣaṇe ratāḥ ke ?
GK16visa01cu:565: balavantaṃ kaṃ na bādhate śītam ? iti praśnaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:572: nanu yadi vyaṅgyo rasa eva kāvyasyātmā tadā vastuno vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyatvamityāśaṅkate “nanu rasādimātreti” /
GK16visa01cu:575: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16visa01cu:576: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16visa01cu:579: (vi, ba) attā ettheti--- “śvaśrūratra nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ pralokaya /
GK16visa01cu:581: ” rātryandhatvena kathitātmānaṃ svagṛhe kṛtāvāsaṃ pathikaṃ prati svayaṃ dūtyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa01cu:587: atra puṃścalīvacanena mat śayyāsthānam abhītaṃ samāgacchetyarthamātrasya dhvanitam /
GK16visa01cu:594: ityādau vastumātrasya vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyavyavahāra iti cet ?
GK16visa01cu:605: anyathā “devadatto grāmaṃ yāti” iti vākye tadbhṛtyasya tadanusaraṇarūpavyaṅgyāvagaterapi kāvyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa01cu:606: astviti cet ? na, rasavata eva kāvyatvāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visa01cu:607_0: kāvyasya prayojanaṃ hi rasāsvādasukhapiṇḍadānadvārā vedaśāstravimukhānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ
GK16visa01cu:610: (vi, ma) rasavata eva kāvyatvāṅgīkāre bījamāha--kāvyasya prayojanamiti /
GK16visa01cu:619: rasāsvāda eva mukhaṃ piṇḍasya dvāreṇa taduktam--- “svādukāvyarasonmiśraṃ vākyārthamupayuñjate /
GK16visa01cu:639: nanu tarhi prabandhāntarvartināṃ keṣāṃcinnīrasānāṃ padyānāṃ kāvyatvaṃ na syāditi cet ?
GK16visa01cu:640: na, rasavatpadyāntargatanīrasapadānāmiva padyarasena, prabandharaseneva teṣāṃ rasavattāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visa01cu:641: yattu nīraseṣvapi guṇābhivyañjakavarṇasadbhāvaddoṣābhāvādalaṅkārasadbhāvācca kāvyavyavahāraḥ sa rasādimatkāvyabandhasāmāyādrauṇa eva /
GK16visa01cu:651: yadyapi varṇo guṇasyaiva vyañjako na kriyāyāstathāpi atra varṇapadaṃ varṇādiparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:661: atra vācyapadaṃ pratīyamānapadārthavyaṅgyabhinnaparam, tena lakṣaṇārthasyāpi parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:671: “rasyate iti rasaḥ” iti vyutpattiyogādbhāvatadābhāsādayo 'pi gṛhyante tatra raso yathā--
GK16visa01cu:678: (lo, ai) evaṃ prāktanalakṣaṇānāṃ prameyavirodhaṃ darśayitvā svalakṣaṇāmavatārayati /
GK16visa01cu:680: rasātmakamityatra rasapadenāsaṃlakṣyakamabhedānāṃ sarveṣāṃ parigraha ityāha--rasyata iti /
GK16visa01cu:685: tadābhāsāḥ rasābhāsā bhāvābhāsāśca ādiśabdāt bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā ca /
GK16visa01cu:687: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanairnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16visa01cu:688: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa isatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16visa01cu:693: atra vilokyetyādikrameṇaiva sakalakriyāṇāṃ pūrvāparabhāvaḥ ktvānirddiṣṭo bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:699: ālokya lajjānamramukhī jātā iti śeṣaḥ mukhena bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:701: etat paryyantākriyāsu bālā karttre, hāsapriyacumbanasya tu karma /
GK16visa01cu:714: śayyāyāḥ kiñcidutthāya utthitā bhūtvā śanairmandaṃ niḥ śabdamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:715: bālā nidrāvyājamuphagatasya priyasya mukhaṃ suciraṃ nirvarṇya dīrghakālaṃ vilokya samyak parīkṣya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:716_0: viśrabdhaṃ niḥ śaṅkaṃ yathā syāttathā paricumbya āsvādya jātapulakā utphullaromāñcāṅkitāṃ
GK16visa01cu:716_1: gaṇḍasthalīṃ vilokya lajjānamramukhī vrīḍāvanatavadanā satī hasatā priyeṇa ciraṃ
GK16visa01cu:730: ciraṃ nirvarṇanena supto na veti sandehaprabhavo vitarkaḥ,
GK16visa01cu:735: nāyakagatā ca vyājanidrāśrayeṇa dhṛtiḥ, ciraparicumbanenautsukyaṃ harṣaśca /
GK16visa01cu:753: asmai yatpadopasthāpitāya kasmaicit anirvacanīyāya arthāddaśāvatāriṇe nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:755: uladhito 'pi matsyasya prauḍhoktyā mahattvāt tacchalkasīmni layaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:773: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikaṇatre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:778: madhudvirepha iti---maheśatapobhaṅgāyā'kālike vasante jāte tiraścāmapi mānmathakriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visa01cu:779: atra priyayā sāhityena madhupānaṃ priyākaṇḍūyanaṃ ca dvirephakṛṣṇasārayo rateranubhāvau /
GK16visa01cu:791: (lo, ā) doṣāḥ punariti---yeṣāṃ sadbhāvena kāvyatvaṃ khaṇiḍatamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:792: kiṃ svarūpāḥ kimākāreṇa varttante iti pūrvavad vyākhyānam /
GK16visa01cu:805: dehadvāreṇova śabdārthadvāreṇa tasyaiva kāvyasyātmabhūtaṃ rasamutkarṣayantaḥ kāvyasyotkarṣakā ityucyante /
GK16visa01cu:815: iha yadyapi guṇānāṃ rasadharmatvaṃ tathāpiguṇaśabdo 'tra guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthayorupacaryate /
GK16visa01cu:816: ataśca “guṇābhiñjakāḥ śabdā rasasyotkarṣakāḥ” ityuktaṃ bhavatīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa01cu:821: nanu śabdārthadvāreṇa rasotkarṣakatvamalaṅkārarītīnāṃ śabdārthadharmāṇāmeva sambhavati rasamātradharmāṇāmeva guṇānāṃ kathaṃ taddvārakatvaṃ vyākhyātamityata āha---iheti /
GK16visa01cu:823: yadyapi varṇā eva guṇābhivyañjakā iti vakṣyante tathāpi varṇena padaṃtenārthastena ca guṇo vyajyate,
GK16visa01cu:826: tathā vyākhyāne tu guṇānāṃ sākṣādrasopakārakatvenaiva kārikārthaḥ saṃgacchate iti bodhyam /
GK16visa01cu:829: satyam kintūtkarṣahetavaḥ proktā guṇālaṅkārarītaya ityuktau alaṅkārarītyoḥ samabhivāyahāreṇa pāṭhavaśāt tadrītikatvalābhaḥ /
GK16visa01cu:834_0: ye ca taddharmaviśeṣāntaḥ pātitvādirūpeṇa pratipādayiṣyamāṇāḥ prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ
GK16visa01cu:837: nanu bhavanmate mādhuryyādayastraya eva guṇāste ca rasamātraniṣṭāḥ /
GK16visa01cu:838: prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ śabdārthaniṣṭatvena viṃsātiprakārāste ca bhavadbhirasvīkṛtatvena ca nirddeṣṭavyāḥ;
GK16visa01cu:841: kintu antarbhāvitvādirūpeṇa śabdārthamātraniṣṭatvāt rasamātraniṣṭaguṇavaijātyāt na pṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visa01cu:843: na vayaṃ teṣāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sasadharmatvenoktānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na svīkurmaḥ,
